mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RCYH_KQZB WHERE BMCODE=#{bmCode} AND SSNY=#{ssny}
SELECT BMLX FROM HTGL_BMB WHERE BMCODE=#{bmCode}

select distinct ry.ryid,ry.zytime,nvl(wxzy.kq,'0706') kq from (select ryid,zytime from htgl_ryb,(select stime+rownum-1 as zytime from (select stime,etime from htgl_nyjcb where yname=#{ssny}) connect by rownum<etime-stime+2) where bmcode=#{bmCode} and qyzt=1)ry left join (select r.ryid,trunc(wx.wgtime,'dd') wgtime,(case substr(wx.yhid,0,2) when '07' then '0702' else '0701' end)kq from rcyh_ryzyjlb r left join rcyh_wxzyjlb wx on r.zyid=wx.zyid) wxzy on ry.ryid=wxzy.ryid and ry.zytime=wxzy.wgtime order by ry.ryid,ry.zytime

select distinct ry.ryid,ry.zytime,nvl(xc.kq,'0706') from (select ryid,zytime from htgl_ryb,(select stime+rownum-1 as zytime from (select stime,etime from htgl_nyjcb where yname=#{ssny}) connect by rownum<etime-stime+2) where bmcode=#{bmCode} and qyzt=1)ry left join (select jlr,fzr,trunc(stime,'dd') wgtime,'0701' as kq from rcyh_glxcsjb) xc on (ry.ryid=xc.jlr or ry.ryid=xc.fzr) and ry.zytime=xc.wgtime order by ry.ryid,ry.zytime
